contentList.content: When resurrected, you resurrect to full health. You also start the combats with all your AP.
[1] enables you to talk to animals. Also increases your max number of summons by 1 but reduce their damages and Vitality by 50%.
[1] gives you [2]% chance to recover a special arrow after shooting it. You are also not penalized by the close-quarter damage penalty on ranged weapons anymore.
Strength increases all your damages by 3% per point, 3% more for all weapon-based attack, statuses will do 5% more damage per point and allows you to lift and carry heavier items.
Intelligence increases all your damages by 3% per point, increases damages from skills by 3% per point and your Accuracy by 2% per point.

[1] reduces all status durations by 1 turn, including positive statuses. Does not affect statuses with a duration of 1 turn. Also increase all your resistances by 10% each time you take a hit from a character, up to 50% until the next turn.
Finesse increases all your damages by 3% per point, you gain 1% dodge and 0.15 Movement per point.
[1] heals you when standing in blood. Also increase your Lifesteal by 25%.
[1] decreases everyone's attitude towards you by [2], but melee opponents find you less attractive in combat. Also increases your Poison resistance by 30% and make you immune to Diseased.
[1] lets you evade attacks of opportunity. Also increase your Dodge by 5% and Movement by 1.
[1] double the points you invested in Memory.

A character with [1] has an extra 30% [3], but takes a [4]% penalty to [5]. Additionally, the maximum [3] is raised by [6]. Demon grants 20% additional damage on Burning and Necrofire you deal. Ice King increases Water damages you deal by 20%.
[1] allows you to flee combat even when enemies are right next to you. Also makes you immune to Crippled, Entangled and Web.
While you are at 75% or more Vitality, [1] grants you an extra [2]% critical chance and [3]% more Chance to hit! Chance to hit is better than Accuracy since it provide a flat bonus.
[1] reduces the cost of using grenades and scrolls by [2] AP when your offhand is free. Also provide 2 free equipment switch per turn.
Shadow
[1] adds an extra [2]m range to your grenade throws. Also increase their damages by 30%
[1] increases AP Start, recovery by 1 and max by 2 if the character have a one handed weapon with the offhand free.
[1] increases damage and Dodging when dual-wielding two one-handed weapons. Also increase offhand damage by 10% per point.
[1] increases damage and Critical Chance when using bows and crossbows. Also increase the range by 0.5m per point when wielding bow, crossbow or wand (also when dual-wielding).
[1] increases damage and Accuracy when using a single-handed weapon (dagger, sword, axe, mace or wand) with a shield or empty off-hand. Also increase armors by 6% and resistances by 2% per point.

[1] increases damage and the Critical Multiplier when using two-handed melee weapons (sword, axe, mace, spear or staff). Also grants 2% of Chance to Hit per point. Chance to Hit provide a flat bonus to hit and thus is better than Accuracy.
The first skill used during your turn have its cooldown reduced by 1 turn.
[1] gives all magical skills a critical chance equal to your critical chance score. Also multiply your Critical Chance by 110%.
[1] restores Magic Armour after you recover from [2] or [3], and restores Physical Armour after [4] or [5]. You also regain 2% of your maximum Vitality per point.

How much chance you have to strike a critical attack when attacking with a weapon or when using a skill that is weapon-based. If you backstab, each percent in Critical Chance provide you a bonus of 2% damage.
